newArivals.Title: ClearBalm Power Elixir
newArivals.Description: Gentle exfoliator that addresses the needs of adult acne-prone skin.
Ingredients: Bixa Orellana Seed Extract: Purifies and refines pores, while acting as a powerful antioxidant. Clinically proven to reduce oil production.
Natural AHAs: Gently exfoliates to smooth and brighten the skin. Our AHAs are derived from sugar cane, sugar maple, bilberry and citrus fruit extracts.
Hyaluronic Acid: This mega-hydrator absorbs easily and locks moisture in without clogging pores.
Broad-Spectrum, Hemp-Derived CBD: Non-intoxicating component of the hemp sativa plant. Shown to exhibit both anti-inflammatory and anti-oxidant properties.
newArivals.ProductInfo: ClearBalm's pore-refining liquid exfoliant effectively targets stubborn breakouts without the use of harsh, drying ingredients. Its innovative plant-based formula gently revitalizes uneven skin tone and texture, while reducing the appearance of fine lines. Dermatologist-founded and-formulated for the needs of adult acne-prone skin.
KeyBenefits: Rejuvenates and smooths adult acne-prone skin.
Powered by Natural AHAs and Broad-Spectrum Hemp-derived CBD (300mg)
No parabens. No sulfates. No PEGs.
HowToUse: Apply 1 or 2 pumps to clean face and neck with fingertips or cotton round in the morning and evening, avoiding the eye area.
Allow to absorb completely. For best results, follow with ClearBalm Serum Hydrator.
Each bottle of our Power Elixir is designed to last for 45 days on average, but may vary with usage.

newArivals.Title: Daily Cleanse® Clear Skin and Acne Supplement
newArivals.Description: A powerful vegan and vegetarian formula of organic algae and 14 detoxifying herbs and minerals to help clear your skin.
Ingredients: Chlorella - a green algae that binds to heavy metals Spirulina - A blue-green algae that binds to heavy metals Milk Thistle - Supports liver detox Alpha Lipoic Acid - Potent antioxidant that clears harmful cells out of the body Dandelion Lea Extract - A prebiotic that aids in digestion Zinc - Mineral to support healthy skin Artichoke - A prebiotic that aids in digestion
newArivals.ProductInfo: A powerful vegan and vegetarian formula of organic algae and 14 detoxifying herbs and minerals to help clear your skin.Clear skin starts from within. Unwanted toxins that remain in the body risk being excreted through the skin, causing unwanted breakouts. This unique combination of detoxifying herbs, spirulina and organic chlorella assists in getting rid of toxins for a clearer, smoother complexion from the inside out.Chlorella contains 9 essential amino acids as well as vitamins and minerals. When combined with zinc and spirulina in our formula they bind to heavy metals in the body. Think of it like an internal sponge, trapping and pulling toxins out of the body. It was also found that those suffering from acne had lower levels of zinc which is why we included it in our formula. At the same time, alpha lipoic acid and milk thistle protect the body from oxidative stress and keep cells functioning properly. Studies have shown ALA to be a vital antioxidant that protects the body’s cells and aids in energy production. Finally, dandelion leaf extract supports the health of the digestive tract and ensures that trapped toxins are easily eliminated from the body.
KeyBenefits: The combination of chlorella, spirulina and zinc help pull heavy metals out of the body stopping breakouts from the inside out. Milk thistle, ALA, Artichoke and Dandelion root help support digestion to ensure toxins can be removed from the body in a timely manner. Fight acne from the inisde out with Daily Cleanse.The combination of chlorella, spirulina and zinc help pull heavy metals out of the body stopping breakouts from the inside out. Milk thistle, ALA, Artichoke and Dandelion root help support digestion to ensure toxins can be removed from the body in a timely manner. Fight acne from the inisde out with Daily Cleanse.
HowToUse: Take two capsules per day, with or without food.
Can be taken at any time of the day
Can be taken at the same time or separately
Expect results in 4-6 weeks.
If skin is prone to purging, reduce to one capsule per day for the
initial 2 weeks.

newArivals.Title: Exfoliating Enzyme Mask
Ingredients: Papain: gently exfoliates the skin.
Wisteria and Coconut derivative: cleanses and purifies.
Vitamin B3: promotes evenness and luminosity of the complexion
Duo of Lavender and Marjoram essential oils: offers a natural comforting scent
newArivals.ProductInfo: New-generation soft peel, the Exfoliating Enzyme Mask is a preparatory skin care that reveals uniformity and radiance of all skin types, including sensitive, in just 1 minute. Skin looks more even and radiant, glowing with beauty. A transforming powder-in-cream texture. A fine powder that transforms into a rich foaming cream upon contact with water, perfect to be applied as a mask. This hybrid skin care combines two expert steps : the power of an exfoliant and the gentleness of a mask for skin that is “as good as new” in a flash. Its natural and delicate scent offers a real moment of comfort. A preparatory mask for all routines. Once or twice a week, use to ideally prepare the skin for the beauty ritual.
KeyBenefits: Provides a radiance-boosting action: the skin is gently exfoliated, dead cells are removed, pores look tightened, and skin’s texture appears refined.
Skin looks unified, smoother and clearer, and its luminosity appears restored. It is ideally prepared for subsequent skin care products.
Bottle was designed to be recyclable.
HowToUse: Dispense 1 gram of powder (about the size of a blueberry) in the palm of the hand and mix with the fingertips while adding a small amount of water until a foaming cream is formed. (Approximately a 1 part Powder to 2 parts Water proportion.)
Apply a thin layer to the entire face and neck, avoiding the eye contour area.
Leave on for 1 minute maximum and rinse thoroughly with water.
Avoid contact with eyes. Follow with the next steps of the daily skincare routine.
May be used 1-2 times a week

newArivals.Title: UV Clear Tinted Broad-Spectrum SPF 46
newArivals.Description: Oil-free EltaMD UV Clear Tinted helps calm and protect sensitive skin types prone to discoloration and breakouts associated to acne and rosacea.
Ingredients: Zinc Oxide (9.0%): Natural mineral compound that works as a sunscreen agent by reflecting and scattering UVA and UVB rays
Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): Anti-inflammatory that reduces redness and minimizes the appearance of dry or damaged skin and restores suppleness
Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid): Humectant that attracts and retains moisture, improving skin feel and restores suppleness
Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E): Antioxidant that reduces free radicals to help diminish the visible signs of aging
newArivals.ProductInfo: Oil-free EltaMD UV Clear Tinted helps calm and protect sensitive skin types prone to discoloration and breakouts associated to acne and rosacea. It contains niacinamide (vitamin B3), hyaluronic acid and lactic acid, ingredients that promote the appearance of healthy-looking skin. Very lightweight and silky, it may be worn with makeup or alone. EltaMD UV Clear is also available in an untinted formula.
KeyBenefits: Color correcting sunscreen hides imperfections and evens skin tone
Minimizes the appearance of dark spots and helps even skin tone while protecting your skin from the sun
Helps calm and protect sensitive skin types prone to acne, rosacea and dark spots
UVA/UVB sun protection with built-in color correction
Paraben-free, fragrance-free, oil-free, sensitivity-free, noncomedogenic, and vegan
HowToUse: Apply liberally to face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure. Use a water-resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating.
Reapply at least every 2 hours

newArivals.Title: 11 11 Eau de Parfum
newArivals.Description: A musky blend of white ambers.
Ingredients: Ozonic Accord
Amberwood
Cyclamen
Marine
White Musk
Driftwood
newArivals.ProductInfo: A beautiful, airy version of the original 11 11. The EDP is delivered in organic sugar cane alcohol which creates a new translation of the classic. Sheer, clean and uplifting with an ethereal vibe, it has a crisp texture and transparency.
HowToUse: Wear on its own or layer over the 11 11 oil to add brightness and longevity.

newArivals.Title: 11 11 Candle
newArivals.Description: The sublime scent of 11 11 tailored into candle form.
Ingredients: Ozonic Accord
Amberwood
Cyclamen
Marine
White Musk
Driftwood
newArivals.ProductInfo: The sublime scent of 11 11 tailored into candle form.
HowToUse: Wear on its own or layer over the 11 11 oil to add brightness and longevity.

newArivals.Title: Limited Edition Dry Texturizing Spray
newArivals.Description: This invisible dry hair spray builds in incredible volume and sexy texture while signature scent, Cote d'Azur, refreshes strands.
Ingredients: Zeolite Crystallines behave like tiny sponges to absorb dirt, oils and odors.
Mango and Aloe Extracts hydrate, smooth and nourish the hair.
Humectants add shine and body while repairing damaged hair.
Kiwi Extract nourishes and helps retain the hair’s moisture balance.
Ginger Root Extract softens and strengthens hair from root to tip.
Specialty Copolymer Blend allows hairstyles to hold longer.
Sunflower Seed Extract delivers incredible shine while providing color protection.

Oribe Signature Complex (Watermelon, Lychee and Edelweiss Flower) defends hair from oxidative stress, photoaging and the deterioration of natural keratin, all while protecting from the drying, damaging and color-depleting effects of the elements.
newArivals.ProductInfo: Bigger, better, full-on glamorous hair. This invisible dry hair spray builds in incredible volume and sexy texture while signature scent, Cote d'Azur, refreshes strands. Patented polymers absorb oil at the roots, leaving you with just-styled hair for days (and nights). Now in a limited edition release featuring an illustration of Oribe co-founder and legendary hairstylist, Oribe Canales. The limited-edition spray also includes a keepsake sticker inside each box featuring an illustration of co-founder and legendary hairstylist Oribe Canales.
KeyBenefits: A revolutionary dry spray for incredible volume and effortless style. Absorbs oil without powdery residue, offering sultry texture and sexy lift.
HowToUse: To break the seal, remove the cap, place your thumb on the back of the applicator, and press firmly until it clicks. Shake.
Hold six to eight inches away from your hair and spray where you want volume.
Style to desired finish and hold.
Tousle your hair for more texture.

newArivals.Title: Sunset Eyeshadow Palette
newArivals.Description: Five universal eyeshadow shades inspired by the alluring colors seen at sunset in both matte and shimmer finishes will effortlessly elevate any look - day or night!
Ingredients: Bixa Orellana Seed Extract: Purifies and refines pores, while acting as a powerful antioxidant. Clinically proven to reduce oil production.
Natural AHAs: Gently exfoliates to smooth and brighten the skin. Our AHAs are derived from sugar cane, sugar maple, bilberry and citrus fruit extracts.
Hyaluronic Acid: This mega-hydrator absorbs easily and locks moisture in without clogging pores.
Broad-Spectrum, Hemp-Derived CBD: Non-intoxicating component of the hemp sativa plant. Shown to exhibit both anti-inflammatory and anti-oxidant properties.
newArivals.ProductInfo: This easy-to-use eyeshadow palette features five universal shades inspired by the magical, shimmering allure of the sunset. These velvety matte and shimmer shades effortlessly enhance any look, day or night, and come in a travel-friendly, mirrored compact that’s perfect for your on-the-go needs!
HowToUse: Apply the base shade all over the eyelid.
Sweep the crease shade across the eyelid crease and blend.
Apply the contour shade to the outer corner of the eyelid for added depth and/or use as an eyeliner along the bottom and top lash lines.
Add a touch of the highlight shade to the center of the eyelid and on the inner corners of eyes.
For an added drama apply the pop shade to the center of the eyelid.

newArivals.Title: Sunset Bronzer & Blush Duo
newArivals.Description: Golden bronzer and peachy-pink blush duo
Ingredients: Vitamin E and apple seed extract: help hydrate, repair and protect skin.
Licorice extract: helps to support skin's elasticity, soothe irritation and reduce redness. Consistent use over time has been known to fade dark spots.
newArivals.ProductInfo: This duo features a universally-flattering, golden shimmer bronzer and peachy-pink shimmer blush that enhance features to create a healthy-looking, sunset-inspired glow! Formulated with vitamin E, licorice and apple seed extract, these vegan, talc-free shades blend effortlessly onto skin for a soft-focused, natural complexion.
HowToUse: First apply the bronzer shade to cheeks, forehead, chin and nose to create a sun-kissed complexion.
Then apply the blush shade to apples of cheeks for a natural pop of color.
Use the Lune+Aster Powder Duo Brush for an all-in-one, effortless application!

newArivals.Title: Tiger By Her Side Eau De Parfum
newArivals.Description: An arresting amber, Tiger By Her Side marries amber accord with vanilla, coriander seed and cinnamon, grounded by a base of patchouli and incense
Ingredients: Bergamot
Cinnamon Bark
Coriander Seed
Rose Absolute
Benzoin Res. Siam
Patchouli
Labdanum Res
Vanilla
Olibanum
newArivals.ProductInfo: This beguiling concoction marries a sensual amber accord with vanilla, coriander seed and cinnamon, grounded by a smouldering base of patchouli and incense. All of our fragrances are vegan and cruelty-free.
HowToUse: Apply fragrance to pulse points on skin and/or onto hair.

newArivals.Title: Berber Blonde Candle
newArivals.Description: The Berber Blonde scented candle with lift your spirits as it sparkles with orange blossom, neroli and musk.
Ingredients: Moroccan Orange Blossom
North African Neroli
Musk
newArivals.ProductInfo: Berber Blonde was inspired by everlasting love (the orange blossom tree is evergreen and blooms throughout the year). Sparkling with Moroccan orange blossom, North African neroli and musk, this sumptuous candle is designed to lift your spirits all year-round as it wafts through your home or garden. Our candles are 100% vegetable wax, vegan and with a lead-free cotton-wick.
HowToUse: Use a long match or lighter to light the candle, and keep the candle in your sight while it burns.
Extinguish the flame when you no longer wish to burn the candle

newArivals.Title: Labyrinth 3-in-1 Texturizing Shampoo + Conditioner + Styler
newArivals.Description: Get touchable, texturized hair right out of the shower.
Ingredients: Cactus, Yuca, and Joshua Tree, lock-in nourishing hydration
Diatomaceous Earth, helps build texture and absorb sebum from hair and scalp
Pea Plant Protein, helps prevent breakage, improve elasticity and seal cuticle
Sunflower Extract, rich in vitamins E + K, and omega 3 fatty acids that protect and add shine
newArivals.ProductInfo: Get touchable, texturized hair right out of the shower. This formula features plumping, light conditioning polymers that gently bond to strands. Hair is lifted up with pliable, weightless, piecey volume and hydration.
KeyBenefits: Get touchable, texturized hair right out of the shower.
This formula features plumping, light conditioning polymers that gently bond to strands.
Hair is lifted up with pliable, weightless, piecey volume and hydration.
HowToUse: Lather up in the shower, then rinse.

newArivals.Title: Root Refresh Micellar Rinse
newArivals.Description: Use the power of apple cider vinegar and micellar water to gently remove odor, sweat, and buildup without leaving behind residue. Apply after a sweaty workout or anytime you need a quick cleanse.
Ingredients: Micellar Water: attaches to dirt and sweat like a magnet, cleaning them from your scalp
Apple Cider Vinegar: to lower scalp pH and minimize scalp bacterial growth
Green Tea Extract: to slow premature aging and inflammation
newArivals.ProductInfo: Sunday II Sunday Root Refresh Micellar Rinse is a color-safe and sulfate-free cleanser that keeps your scalp (and look) fresh between washes.
KeyBenefits: Get touchable, texturized hair right out of the shower.
This formula features plumping, light conditioning polymers that gently bond to strands.
Hair is lifted up with pliable, weightless, piecey volume and hydration.
HowToUse: Shake well to activate
Spritz evenly on hair and scalp
Gently massage scalp to evenly distribute rinse and to remove buildup
Can be used daily

newArivals.Title: Pumpkin Chai Classic
newArivals.Description: Create a cozy autumn ambiance with this exquisitely fragranced Classic Candle featuring a blend of wild pumpkin, spicy masala chai, cardamom, ginger, and cinnamon.
Ingredients: Wild pumpkin
Spicy masala chai
Cardamom
Ginger
Cinnamon
newArivals.ProductInfo: This exquisitely fragranced Classic Candle elevates everyday living and entertaining. It is meticulously crafted with a proprietary premium wax formulated so the candle burns cleanly and evenly and infuses a room with exceptional scent.
KeyBenefits: Get touchable, texturized hair right out of the shower.
This formula features plumping, light conditioning polymers that gently bond to strands.
Hair is lifted up with pliable, weightless, piecey volume and hydration.
HowToUse: Center and straighten the wick after blowing out your candle
Burn candles in a well-ventilated room
Keep the wax pool clear of wick trimmings, matches and debris
Keep burning candles away from drafts, vents, fans or air currents
Before re-lighting a candle, let the candle cool completely
Burn regular sized candles for 3–4 hours at a time.
Burn candles in an ambient of 65–75 degrees °F
When burning multiple candles, place at least 8 inches apart.
If a candle is burning unevenly and the wick is centered, it’s in a draft

makeup.Title: ReEvolve Natural Finish Liquid Foundation
makeup.Description: A silicone-free, skincare infused daily wear liquid foundation that provides medium coverage with a natural finish.
Ingredients: Tightenyl™: A cutting edge active ingredient derived from biotechnology research to firm, tone and smooth skin
RMS Adaptogenic Herbal Blend: Hand-selected by Rose-Marie, our proprietary blend of 9 adaptogenic herbs help to balance the skin, soothe, soften and hydrate
Vegetable Squalene: A moisture-rich, plant-based emollient that hydrates skin
Organic Aloe: Rich in antioxidants and vitamins, it helps soothe, moisturize and smooth the appearance of the skin
makeup.ProductInfo: Fresh feeling and easy to blend, this power-packed formula delivers smooth, long-lasting medium coverage while it hydrates, firms and softens. Formulated with ingredients like advanced Tightenyl™, moisture-rich vegetable squalene, soothing organic aloe and our signature rms adaptogenic herbal blend bottled up in an innovative, refillable package.
HowToUse: Begin with one pump on the back of your hand and build with a second pump for more coverage.
Blend into skin using fingers, brush or the rms skin2skin beauty sponge.

makeup.Title: Jaguar Eye Quartet
Ingredients: Tightenyl™: A cutting edge active ingredient derived from biotechnology research to firm, tone and smooth skin
RMS Adaptogenic Herbal Blend: Hand-selected by Rose-Marie, our proprietary blend of 9 adaptogenic herbs help to balance the skin, soothe, soften and hydrate
Vegetable Squalene: A moisture-rich, plant-based emollient that hydrates skin
Organic Aloe: Rich in antioxidants and vitamins, it helps soothe, moisturize and smooth the appearance of the skin
makeup.ProductInfo: Four dynamic eye shades inspired by the mysterious black jaguar. A quad of matte, creamy chrome pearl and gentle shimmer textures offer endless opportunities for dramatic, artful looks. Created to support the Amazon Sacred Headwaters Initiative.
HowToUse: Apply with the Shade and Sweep Eye Brush
Shades can be layered or worn separately

For an added drama apply the pop shade to the center of the eyelid.

makeup.Title: Petal Soft Lip
Ingredients: Soft Focus Flex Powders: blurring for a smooth, matte lip look
Gel Wrapped Pigments: comfortable, non-drying color instantly and over time
Power Care Blend: improves lip texture
Plant Derived Emollient: blend of coconut and glycerin, lightweight and moisturizing
Raspberry Seed Oil: creates a lipid barrier for moisture retention
Mango Butter: moisturizes skin and helps to reduce fine lines and wrinkles
Shea Butter: conditioning, helps to restore skin elasticity
Plant Derived Vitamin C: strong skin affinity, fatty acids increase penetration.
makeup.ProductInfo: A sheer matte lip color that makes your lips petal-soft delivering 12 hours of weightless wear and 24 hours of lip softening hydration.
KeyBenefits: Lips feel more hydrated after using for 2 weeks
Lips look smoother after using for 2 weeks
Product is easy to apply for an effortless look
Formulated without Fragrance, Parabens, Phthalates, Mineral Oil
HowToUse: For an opaque blurred effect: apply bullet directly to lips and then press in with fingers to diffuse color.
For a sheer blurred effect: apply Petal Soft Lipstick Crayon to finger tips and then press into lips for a lighter application of color.

makeup.Title: Radiant Creamy Concealer
makeup.Description: The #1 concealer in the U.S. This multi-purpose must-have brightens, corrects and perfects with creamy, medium-to-buildable coverage and a natural, radiant finish.
Ingredients: 16-hour wear Lasts all day Crease-resistant Sweat-resistant Humidity-proof Transfer-resistant Water-resistant For all skin types No alcohol, parabens or fragrance Dermatologist tested Opthalmologist tested Non-comedogenic
makeup.ProductInfo: The #1 concealer in the U.S. This multi-purpose must-have brightens, corrects and perfects with creamy, medium-to-buildable coverage and a natural, radiant finish.Discover the #1 concealer in the U.S.* Brightens. Corrects. Perfects. All day long. Coveted by artists and non-artists alike for its luxurious texture and luminous finish. Radiant Creamy Concealer delivers all-purpose, 16-hour perfection for all skin tones. Enriched with hydrating, multi-action skincare benefits and light diffusing technology, it instantly obscures imperfections and diminishes fine lines and signs of fatigue. This multi-purpose concealer can also be used for highlighting and contouring. Available in 22 shades. The #1 selling prestige concealer in the U.S.* *Source: The NPD Group, Inc. / U.S. Prestige Beauty Total Department/Specialty, Makeup Sales, January-September 2019
KeyBenefits: Lips feel more hydrated after using for 2 weeks
Lips look smoother after using for 2 weeks
Product is easy to apply for an effortless look
Formulated without Fragrance, Parabens, Phthalates, Mineral Oil
HowToUse: • Can be applied directly from the applicator, with fingertips or the #12 Cream Blending Brush.
• As a highlighter, select 1-3 shades lighter than the concealer shade and place on high points of the face
To add contour and dimension, apply concealer in the hollows of the cheeks, on temples, along the hairline and jawline.

makeup.Title: Sunset Bronzer & Blush Duo
makeup.Description: Golden bronzer and peachy-pink blush duo
Ingredients: 16-hour wear Lasts all day Crease-resistant Sweat-resistant Humidity-proof Transfer-resistant Water-resistant For all skin types No alcohol, parabens or fragrance Dermatologist tested Opthalmologist tested Non-comedogenic
makeup.ProductInfo: A multitasking under-eye treatment and brightener. Banishes the look of darkness and fatigue while blurring the look of fine lines for a dramatically lifted effect.
KeyBenefits: Lips feel more hydrated after using for 2 weeks
Lips look smoother after using for 2 weeks
Product is easy to apply for an effortless look
Formulated without Fragrance, Parabens, Phthalates, Mineral Oil
HowToUse: • Can be applied directly from the applicator, with fingertips or the #12 Cream Blending Brush.
• As a highlighter, select 1-3 shades lighter than the concealer shade and place on high points of the face
To add contour and dimension, apply concealer in the hollows of the cheeks, on temples, along the hairline and jawline.
